stsjorbsmod:CharityMemory.NAME: Charity
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Gain #b1 #yStrength for every #b!G! gold you have. (Gain #b!S! Strength.)

stsjorbsmod:ChastityMemory.NAME: Chastity
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRemember: Gain #b!R! #yDexterity. Apply #b!W! #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL #pPassive: At the end of each turn, lose #b!D! #yDexterity and gain #b!B! #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:DiligenceMemory.NAME: Diligence
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRemember: Draw #b!D! cards. NL #pPassive: At the end of your turn, #yRetain #b!M!.

stsjorbsmod:EnvyMemory.NAME: Envy
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRemember: Gain #b!V! #yVulnerable. #pPassive: Whenever you target an enemy with a card, apply #b!M! #yVulnerable to that enemy.

stsjorbsmod:GluttonyMemory.NAME: Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by #b!M!. At the start of each turn, discard #b1 card.

stsjorbsmod:GreedMemory.NAME: Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, gain #b!M! gold.

stsjorbsmod:HumilityMemory.NAME: Humility
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRemember: Gain #b!R! #yThorns. NL #pPassive: Gain an additional #b2 #yThorns. (Gain #b!P! Thorns.)

stsjorbsmod:PatienceMemory.NAME: Patience
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Gain #b1 #yCoil each time you play a card.

stsjorbsmod:PrideMemory.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Lose #b!D! #yDexterity. At the end of combat, permanently #yUpgrade a card in your deck.

stsjorbsmod:SlothMemory.NAME: Sloth
DESCRIPTIONS: #pRemember: Discard #b!D! cards at random. NL #pPassive: Draw #b!M! fewer cards and gain #b!E! additional [E] each turn.

stsjorbsmod:TemperanceMemory.NAME: Temperance
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Gain #yStrength equal to the number of #yClarities you have. (Gain #b!S! Strength.)

stsjorbsmod:WrathMemory.NAME: Wrath
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPassive: Whenever you kill a non-minion enemy, permanently increase the damage of the last damage-dealing attack card played this combat (currently, !C!) by #b!M!.
